publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-5828 Ted Brocklebank: Congratulations to Jack Vettriano—That the Parliament congratulates Fife-born artist Jack Vettriano on being named 2010’s Great Scot; acknowledges his national and international appeal; notes that his work has never been added to the permanent collection of the National Galleries of Scotland, and calls on the galleries to recognise officially his inspiring contribution to Scottish art.

S3M-5828 Ted Brocklebank: Congratulations to Jack Vettriano—That the Parliament congratulates Fife-born artist Jack Vettriano on being named 2010’s Great Scot; acknowledges his national and international appeal; notes that his work has never been added to the permanent collection of the National Galleries of Scotland, and calls on the galleries to recognise officially his inspiring contribution to Scottish art. Supported by: John Wilson*, Jackson Carlaw*, Murdo Fraser*, Jamie McGrigor*, John Lamont*, Shirley-Anne Somerville*, Bill Aitken*, Jackie Baillie*, Maureen Watt*, Tricia Marwick*, Nanette Milne*, Stuart McMillan*, Sandra White*, Bob Doris*, Mary Scanlon*
S3M-5828 Congratulations to Jack Vettriano (lodged on 25 February 2010) Margaret Mitchell*, Bill Kidd*, Elaine Smith*, Brian Adam*, Mike Pringle*, Gil Paterson*
S3M-5828 Congratulations to Jack Vettriano (lodged on 25 February 2010) Jamie Hepburn*
S3M-5828 Congratulations to Jack Vettriano (lodged on 25 February 2010) Marilyn Livingstone*
S3M-5828 Congratulations to Jack Vettriano (lodged on 25 February 2010) Linda Fabiani*
